Title: Relates to finding alternatives to the use of pesticides in the monarch preservation plan
Summary: Relates to finding alternatives to the use of pesticides in the monarch preservation plan and allowing agricultural lands that are not in active production be used to enhance the monarch butterfly habitat.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-0541, En Con L (as proposed in S.3163 & A.1819)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to alternatives for the use of pesticides in the monarch preservation plan
